name: Happy Crowd
description:
Happy Crowd is a management-party game in 3 levels. 

You're in a middle of an angry crowd. Try to get their smile back and make them happy before the time's up ! Between grandmas, punks and salarymen, you must be careful to who can tolerate who, and which action works on who. But sometimes, you'll even have to shout to achieve your goal ! 

INDICATIONS : -At the title screen, you have to choose options with your mouse, but the rest of the game can be played with a keyboard or a controller.

I made this game during the global game jam with a wonderful team of 6 peoples.

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/happy-crowd
